name: A Christmas Dream (SecretSantaJam2020 Entry)
description:
For the Secret Santa Jam, we wanted to make a game about finding your Christmas spirit again. Especially as Christmas is very different this year.

This game is made for a  father who is participating together with his nine year old daughter. They love the Mario games and we wanted to make something they can enjoy together.

Source Code
  • Not Open Source, due to incompatible asset licenses 
Technology used

Unity, Photoshop, Jetbrains Rider, Git, FMOD Studio

Help / Controls
  • Control the father with WASD
  • Control the daughter with the arrow keys
Game Jam
  • Secret Santa Jam 2020
  • Theme: See Game Jam Website
  • Time: Several Days
Team
  • Benjamin Justice (Concept, Code)
  • Sabrina Heuvelmann (Concept, Story)
  • Stefanie Curth (Art)
  • Christian Plinke (Music)
